1353322211222211.content:
Freddie wakes up. He feels cold and is looking up at the ceiling. "What happened?" He questions before trying to move. He attempts to move, he doesn't move at all. "Why can't I move?" He says to himself panicking.

Freddie looks around and notices that he's in a bowl. "Wait? What? Why am I in the fruit bowl?" Freddie think for a few seconds. He then looks down. Extending downwards is a yellow banana. Freddie screams. "I'm a banana."

Freddie hears a noise. He's scared. A shadow looms over the other fruit and a hand comes down. He recognises the hand as Carly's. She grabs the apple right beside him and lifts it up. That apple is going to meet its demise. Freddie screams to try and get Carly's attention but he watches as the shadow walks away. "This can't be real," he thinks to himself. "People don't turn into bananas."

Out of nowhere a hand wraps around Freddie. He screams. The hand twists around and he sees that it's Carly holding him. Freddie looks at Carly. Never has she looked so intimidating and threatening. Carly begins to walk away with Freddie in her hand. Freddie realises something. Carly is
1353322211222211.title: Banana
